noun.description: A marine bivalve mollusc of the family Pectinidae; a scallop.

adjective.description: Of, relating to, or designating the family Pectinidae of marine bivalve molluscs.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Isaac Funk (1839–1912), publisher and reformer. From scientific Latin Pectinidae, family name (1839 in Penny Cycl XIII. 283/1; compare earlier Pectinida, and also Pectinideae, Pectinides, and French pectinidées, pectinides) from Pectin-, stem of Pecten, genus name of the scallop + -idae. With the adjective compare earlier pectinoid.
